Announcements:
<color=lightblue>August 8th, 2025 - Welcome to our Alpha Demo!</color>

This demo is a taste of what is to come, and while we'd love to reveal everything to you already, we did pack in as much as we could without giving away too much either.

Mess with and break the game! There's a good lot to discover in this demo. All of us have been pretty addicted to Stabjack, so we hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

Also, <link="Steam"><color=lightblue><u>Wishlisting</u></color></link> us on Steam is very meaningful and helps us a ton!
For any feedback and our community, we have a <link="Discord"><color=lightblue><u>Discord</u></color></link> too, come join in!

- Arthur Yurov, Game Director
Changelog:
<color=lightblue>August 8th, 2025 - v0.37.10</color>

- Fixed Sharp cards breaking when dragging them improperly
- Fixed summoned enemies sometimes spawning with incorrect healh

<color=lightblue>August 8th, 2025 - v0.37.9</color>

- Initial public Alpha release
